title: Birational maps, PBW degenerate flags and poset polytopes
abstract:
We extend the results on the graph closures of the birational maps between
projective spaces and Grassmannians to the case of PBW degenerate flag
varieties. The advantage of the PBW degenerate flags (as opposed to their
classical analogues) is the existence of a large group of symmetries for the
graph closures. We discuss the combinatorial, algebraic and geometric sides of
the picture. In particular, we show that toric degenerations of Borovik,
Sturmfels and Sverrisd\'ottir are still available in the general settings. We
also derive a description of the graph closures for flag varieties in terms of
quiver representations.
